SELECT d.*, o.name as ownerName,brand.name as brandName,factory.name as factoryName,location.name as locationName FROM dot d LEFT JOIN own o ON d.owner_id = o.id left join brand on d.brand_id = brand.id left join factory on d.factory_id = factory.id left join location on d.localid = location.id
and brand like concat('%', #{brand},'%')
select d.* from dot d left join location l on d.localid = l.id where localid = #{localid}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Dot WHERE is_delete=0;
